title: Drawing, "Young girl seated with basket", 1878–80
medium: Black and white chalk, brush and white gouache on gray paper
signed: Signed in graphite, at lower right: Winslow Homer
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Vertical full view of a young girl sitting, with her head turned toward the right, and holding a basket with her left hand.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Young girl seated with basket", 1878–80.
1878–80. Black and white chalk, brush and white gouache on gray paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-79.
